text: The best augury of a man's success in his profession is that he thinks it the finest in the world.
author: George Eliot

text: For what is love itself, for the one we love best? An enfolding of immeasurable cares which yet are better than any joys outside our love.
author: George Eliot

text: If you're lucky enough to have a pretty girl love you and share herself and sleep with you, make that your secret. The best way to spoil love is by talking to too many people about it.
author: Rip Torn

text: You hear the best stories from ordinary people. That sense of immediacy is more real to me than a lot of writerly, literary-type crafted stories. I want that immediacy when I read a novel.
author: Chuck Palahniuk

text: Some of the best ideas I get seem to happen when I'm doing mindless manual labor or exercise. I'm not sure how that happens, but it leaves me free for remarkable ideas to occur.
author: Chuck Palahniuk
